abstract: The Russian natural gas company cut about a quarter of the gas supply to Ukraine on Monday to force the country to settle a debt.
snippet: The Russian natural gas company cut about a quarter of the gas supply to Ukraine on Monday to force the country to settle a debt.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  Gazprom, the Russian natural gas company and the world’s largest, cut about a quarter of the gas supply to Ukraine on Monday to force the country to settle a debt.

headline.main: A Quarter of Gas Cut to Ukraine by Gazprom
headline.print_headline: A Quarter Of Gas Cut To Ukraine By Gazprom
